text: If Brandi and Tish Cyrus look at Miley Cyrus, all they see is the happiest family member. The Malibu singer continues to be happy and to celebrate her return to music, and her fans are learning more and more about what makes this talented young artist happier with every passing day. “ Something I really respect about Miley is the fact that she does truly know what is important and what matters. And that does not mean overworking herself and being on tour all year anymore, ” according to Miley ’ s sister Brandi Cyrus. Brandi also said, “ That means her family and her life at home and her animals and making the music she really loves and I think that is something that comes with age when you start to realize that, and she is there and that is why I believe she is so happy
